cakes.name: Vanilla Cake
cakes.description: Vanilla sponge cake made with rich butter and vanilla essence layered with cream

cakes.name: Chocolate Cake
cakes.description: Chocolate sponge cake made with high quality cocoa, refined flour and butter, layered with cream and chocolate.

cakes.name: Butterscotch Cake
cakes.description: Soft cake layered with butterscotch cream made with original butter and topped with caramel sauce

cakes.name: Pineapple Cake
cakes.description: Cake sponge made with pineapple essence and soaked it with pineapple juice layered with cream and pineapple chunks.

cakes.name: Fruit Cake
cakes.description: Vanilla sponge cake made with rich butter and soaked with fruit juice [kiwi, orange, apple and pomogranate] layered with cream and fruit chunks

cakes.name: Red Velvet Cake
cakes.description: Soft red colored sponge cake with mild cocoa and cream cheese frosting

cakes.name: Chocolate Truffle Cake
cakes.description: Chocolate sponge made with rich butter, refined flour, cocoa powder and layered with chocolate ganache

cakes.name: White Chocolate Truffle Cake
cakes.description: Vanilla sponge made with rich butter, refined flour,  white choco chunks and layered with white chocolate ganache

Brownies.name: Classic Brownie
Brownies.description: Fudgy brownie made with butter, refined flour, cocoa powder, melted chocolate and eggs [ eggless version is also available] with intense taste

Brownies.name: Double Chocolate Brownie
Brownies.description: Fudgy brownie  made with butter, refined flour, cocoa powder, melted chocolate and eggs [ eggless version is also available] with extra drizzled chocolate

Brownies.name: Dry Fruit Brownie
Brownies.description: Brownie loaded with roasted dry fruits made with butter, refined flour, cocoa powder, melted chocolate  and eggs [ eggless version is also available] with intense taste

Brownies.name: Assorted Brownie
Brownies.description: Assorted Brownies (9 Flavours) - A delightful box of rich, fudgy brownies in 9 different flavours, including Nutella, Peanut Butter, Biscoff, Dry Fruit, Dark Chocolate, Milk Chocolate, Walnut, Choco-chip, and Classic Chocolate. Perfect for gifting or indulging in a variety of flavors in one box.

Brownies.name: Customize Berry Brownie
Brownies.description: Brownie loaded with strawberries and white choco chunks  made with butter, refined flour, cocoa powder, melted chocolate  and eggs [ eggless version is also available] with intense taste

Brownies.name: Custom Pomo-Brownie
Brownies.description: Mini brownie cake with custom pomogranate topping on chocolate ,made with high quality ingredients

Brownies.name: Classic Brownie Pcs of 4
Brownies.description: Classic brownie box of 4 piece [ customization available]

Brownies.name: Dry Fruit Brownie Pcs of 6
Brownies.description: Dry fruit brownie box of 6 piece [ customiation  available ]

blondie.name: White Chocolate Blondie
blondie.description: White chocolate blondie cake made butter, flour , milk and white melted chocolate [ egg/eggless ] which gives the unique taste

dum ke roat/ cookies.name: Dum Ke Roat
dum ke roat/ cookies.description: Hyderabadi authentic DUM KE ROAT made with dry fruits flour, semolina, butter/ ghee , milk . it gives the luxurious taste

dum ke roat/ cookies.name: Choco Chip Cookie
dum ke roat/ cookies.description: Chocochip cookie includes brown butter, refined flour, sugar and lots of chocolate chunks

dum ke roat/ cookies.name: Red Velvet Cookie
dum ke roat/ cookies.description: Red valvet cookie made with red food color and little amount of cocoa powder, cream cheese,butter, refined flour. which gives the balance taste

dum ke roat/ cookies.name: Lemon Crinkle Cookie
dum ke roat/ cookies.description: Lemon crinckle cookie made with zest, lemon juice ,butter , flour and sugar which gives the perfect balance of sweet and sour

puri.name: Puran Puri
puri.description: Traditional puris stuffed with smooth puran prepared from cooked chana dal, jaggery, ghee,  dry fruits and aromatic spices.

puri.name: Choconut Puri
puri.description: Golden fried puris stuffed with a sweet filling of freshly grated coconut, sugar, dry fruits and cardamom.

puri.name: Khowa Puri
puri.description: Traditional puris filled with rich khowa prepared from slow-cooked milk, sugar, ghee, dry fruits and aromatic cardamom.
